fields.desc: Is null, boolean, or integer value. If it's a post then this will contain an object with the all generated values, such as an ID.
fields.name: data

fields.desc: Was the request successful
fields.name: success

fields.desc: HTTP Status Code
fields.name: status

basic.description: This is the basic response for requests that do not return data. If the POST request has a Basic model it will return the id.

fields.desc: The account id for the username requested.
fields.name: id
url
fields.desc: The account username, will be the same as requested in the URL

fields.name: bio
fields.desc: A basic description the user has filled out

fields.name: reputation
fields.desc: The reputation for the account, in it's numerical format.
The epoch time of account creation
fields.name: created

fields.desc: False if not a pro user, their expiration date if they are.
fields.name: pro_expiration

account.description: This model is used to represent the basic account information.

fields.name: id
fields.desc: Conversation ID

fields.name: last_message_preview
fields.desc: Preview of the last message
Time of last sent message, epoch time
fields.name: datetime
with_account_id
fields.desc: Account ID of the other user in conversation

fields.name: with_account
fields.desc: Account username of the other user in conversation

fields.name: message_count
fields.desc: Total number of messages in the conversation

fields.name: messages
fields.desc: OPTIONAL: (only available when requesting a specific conversation) Reverse sorted such that most recent message is at the end of the array.

fields.name: done
fields.desc: OPTIONAL: (only available when requesting a specific conversation) Flag to indicate whether you've reached the beginning of the thread.

fields.name: page
fields.desc: OPTIONAL: (only available when requesting a specific conversation) Number of the next page

conversation.description: The base model for a conversation.

fields.desc: Username of the account that created the custom gallery
fields.name: account_url
link
fields.desc: The URL link to the custom gallery
An array of all the tag names in the custom gallery
fields.name: tags
item_count
fields.desc: The total number of gallery items in the custom gallery
An array of all the gallery items in the custom gallery
fields.type: Array of Gallery Images and Gallery Albums
fields.name: items

custom_gallery.description: This model represents a user's custom or filtered gallery

fields.name: id
fields.desc: ID of the topic.

fields.name: name
fields.desc: Topic name
Description of the topic
fields.name: description

fields.desc: CSS class used on website to style the ephemeral topic
fields.name: css

fields.desc: Whether it is an ephemeral (e.g. current events) topic
fields.name: ephemeral
topPost
fields.desc: The top image in this topic

fields.name: heroImage
fields.desc: The current 'hero' image chosen by the Imgur community staff

fields.name: isHero
fields.desc: Whether the topic's heroImage should be used as the overall hero image

topic.description: The base model for a topic.

account_settings.example:
{
   "success" : true,
   "data" : {
      "show_mature" : false,
      "public_images" : false,
      "high_quality" : true,
      "album_privacy" : "secret",
      "accepted_gallery_terms" : true,
      "first_party" : true,
      "pro_expiration" : false,
      "active_emails" : [],
      "email" : "josh@imgur.com"
   },
   "status" : 200
}
account_settings.description: The account settings, only accessible if you're logged in as the user.

fields.desc: The account username
fields.name: account_url

fields.desc: The users email address
fields.name: email

fields.desc: The users ability to upload higher quality images, there will be less compression
fields.name: high_quality
public_images
fields.desc: Automatically allow all images to be publicly accessible
Set the album privacy to this privacy setting on creation
fields.name: album_privacy

fields.desc: False if not a pro user, their expiration date if they are.
fields.name: pro_expiration

fields.desc: True if the user has accepted the terms of uploading to the Imgur gallery.
fields.name: accepted_gallery_terms

fields.desc: The email addresses that have been activated to allow uploading
fields.name: active_emails
messaging_enabled
fields.desc: If the user is accepting incoming messages or not
An array of users that have been blocked from messaging, the object is blocked_id and blocked_url.
fields.name: blocked_users
show_mature
fields.desc: True if the user has opted to have mature images displayed in gallery list endpoints.
True unless the user created their account via a third party service such as Google Plus.
fields.name: first_party
id
fields.desc: The ID for the image

fields.name: title
fields.desc: The title of the image.

fields.name: description
fields.desc: Description of the image.
Time inserted into the gallery, epoch time
fields.name: datetime
type
fields.desc: Image MIME type.

fields.name: animated
fields.desc: is the image animated

fields.name: width
fields.desc: The width of the image in pixels
The height of the image in pixels
fields.name: height

fields.desc: The size of the image in bytes
fields.name: size

fields.desc: The number of image views
fields.name: views

fields.desc: Bandwidth consumed by the image in bytes
fields.name: bandwidth
deletehash
fields.desc: OPTIONAL, the deletehash, if you're logged in as the image owner
The direct link to the the image. (Note: if fetching an animated GIF that was over 20MB in original size, a .gif thumbnail will be returned)
fields.name: link
gifv
fields.desc: OPTIONAL, The .gifv link. Only available if the image is animated and type is 'image/gif'.
OPTIONAL, The direct link to the .mp4. Only available if the image is animated and type is 'image/gif'.
fields.name: mp4
mp4_size
fields.desc: OPTIONAL, The Content-Length of the .mp4. Only available if the image is animated and type is 'image/gif'. Note that a zero value (0) is possible if the video has not yet been generated

fields.name: looping
fields.desc: OPTIONAL, Whether the image has a looping animation. Only available if the image is animated and type is 'image/gif'.

fields.name: vote
fields.desc: The current user's vote on the album. null if not signed in or if the user hasn't voted on it.
Indicates if the current user favorited the image. Defaults to false if not signed in.
fields.name: favorite
nsfw
fields.desc: Indicates if the image has been marked as nsfw or not. Defaults to null if information is not available.
Number of comments on the gallery image.
fields.name: comment_count

fields.desc: Topic of the gallery image.
fields.name: topic

fields.desc: Topic ID of the gallery image.
fields.name: topic_id

fields.desc: If the image has been categorized by our backend then this will contain the section the image belongs in. (funny, cats, adviceanimals, wtf, etc)
fields.name: section
account_url
fields.desc: The username of the account that uploaded it, or null.
The account ID of the account that uploaded it, or null.
fields.name: account_id
ups
fields.desc: Upvotes for the image
Number of downvotes for the image
fields.name: downs

fields.desc: Upvotes minus downvotes
fields.name: points

fields.desc: Imgur popularity score
fields.name: score
is_album
fields.desc: If it's an album or not
Indicates if the image is in the most viral gallery or not.
fields.name: in_most_viral

gallery_profile.description: The totals for a users gallery information.

fields.name: total_gallery_comments
fields.desc: Total number of comments the user has made in the gallery

fields.name: total_gallery_favorites
fields.desc: Total number of items favorited by the user in the gallery
Total number of images submitted by the user.
fields.name: total_gallery_submissions
trophies
fields.desc: An array of trophies that the user has.

fields.name: id
fields.desc: The ID for the comment
The ID of the image that the comment is for
fields.name: image_id
comment
fields.desc: The comment itself.

fields.name: author
fields.desc: Username of the author of the comment
The account ID for the author
fields.name: author_id
on_album
fields.desc: If this comment was done to an album
The ID of the album cover image, this is what should be displayed for album comments
fields.name: album_cover
ups
fields.desc: Number of upvotes for the comment
The number of downvotes for the comment
fields.name: downs

fields.desc: the number of upvotes - downvotes
fields.name: points

fields.desc: Timestamp of creation, epoch time
fields.name: datetime

fields.desc: If this is a reply, this will be the value of the comment_id for the caption this a reply for.
fields.name: parent_id
deleted
fields.desc: Marked true if this caption has been deleted
The current user's vote on the comment. null if not signed in or if the user hasn't voted on it.
fields.name: vote
children
fields.desc: All of the replies for this comment. If there are no replies to the comment then this is an empty set.

comment.description: This data model represents an images comment.

fields.name: name
fields.desc: Name of the tag.

fields.name: followers
fields.desc: Number of followers for the tag.

fields.name: total_items

fields.name: items

fields.type: Array of Gallery Images and Gallery Albums

tag.description: The base model for a tag.

fields.desc: The ID for the notification
fields.name: id
account_id
fields.desc: The Account ID for the notification
Has the user viewed the image yet?

content

notification.example:
{
    "data": {
        "replies": [{
            "id": 4511,
            "account_id": 384077,
            "viewed": false,
            "content": {
                "album_cover": null,
                "author": "jasdev",
                "author_id": 3698510,
                "children": [],
                "comment": "Reply test",
                "datetime": 1406070774,
                "deleted": false,
                "downs": 0,
                "id": 3616,
                "image_id": "VK9VqcM",
                "on_album": false,
                "parent_id": 3615,
                "points": 1,
                "ups": 1,
                "vote": null
            }
        }],
        "messages": [{
            "id": 4523,
            "account_id": 384077,
            "viewed": false,
            "content": {
                "id": "620",
                "from": "jasdev",
                "account_id": "384077",
                "with_account": "3698510",
                "last_message": "wow. such message.",
                "message_num": "103",
                "datetime": 1406935917
            }
        }]
    },
    "success": true,
    "status": 200
}

album.description: This model represents the data for albums

fields.desc: The ID for the album
fields.name: id

fields.desc: The title of the album in the gallery
fields.name: title

fields.desc: The description of the album in the gallery
fields.name: description

fields.desc: Time inserted into the gallery, epoch time
fields.name: datetime

fields.desc: The ID of the album cover image
fields.name: cover
cover_width
fields.desc: The width, in pixels, of the album cover image

fields.name: cover_height
fields.desc: The height, in pixels, of the album cover image
The account username or null if it's anonymous.
fields.name: account_url
account_id
fields.desc: The account ID  or null if it's anonymous.

fields.name: privacy
fields.desc: The privacy level of the album, you can only view public if not logged in as album owner
The view layout of the album.
fields.name: layout
views
fields.desc: The number of album views
The URL link to the album
fields.name: link

fields.desc: Indicates if the current user favorited the image. Defaults to false if not signed in.
fields.name: favorite

fields.desc: Indicates if the image has been marked as nsfw or not. Defaults to null if information is not available.
fields.name: nsfw

fields.desc: If the image has been categorized by our backend then this will contain the section the image belongs in. (funny, cats, adviceanimals, wtf, etc)
fields.name: section

fields.desc: Order number of the album on the user's album page (defaults to 0 if their albums haven't been reordered)
fields.name: order
deletehash
fields.desc: OPTIONAL, the deletehash, if you're logged in as the album owner
The total number of images in the album
fields.name: images_count

fields.desc: An array of all the images in the album (only available when requesting the direct album)
fields.name: images

fields.desc: True if the image has been submitted to the gallery, false if otherwise.
fields.name: in_gallery

fields.desc: The ID for the message

fields.desc: Account username of person sending the message
fields.name: from

fields.desc: The account ID of the person receiving the message

fields.desc: The account ID of the person who sent the message
fields.name: sender_id

fields.desc: Text of the message
fields.name: body
conversation_id
fields.desc: ID for the overall conversation

fields.name: datetime
fields.desc: Time message was sent, epoch time

fields.desc: OPTIONAL, The direct link to the .mp4. Only available if the image is animated and type is 'image/gif'.

meme_metadata.description: This model is used to represent the basic meme metadata.

fields.name: meme_name
fields.desc: The name of the meme used.

fields.name: top_text
fields.desc: The top text of the meme.
The bottom text of the meme.
fields.name: bottom_text

fields.desc: The image id of the background image of the meme.
fields.name: bg_image

vote.description: The base model for a vote.
